select bill.fid as id,bill.FNAME as title ,bill.FNUMBER as num,bill.FCHANGESTATE as changeState, bill.FCHANGEREASONID as changeReasonId,cra.FNAME_L2 as changeReason, bill.FSTATE as auditState,bill.FBOOKEDDATE as bizDate,bill.FCURPROJECTID as projectId,pro.FNAME_L2 as projectName, bill.FAUDITTYPEID as auditTypeId,ct.FNAME_L2 as auditType,bill.FTOTALCOST as totalCost,bill.FREADESC as reaDesc, bill.FAUDITORID as auditorId,pu.FNAME_L2 as auditor,bill.FAUDITTIME as auditTime from T_CON_ChangeAuditBill bill left join T_FDC_CurProject pro on pro.fid=bill.FCURPROJECTID left join T_FDC_ChangeType ct on ct.fid=bill.FAUDITTYPEID left join T_FDC_ChangeReason cra on cra.FID=bill.FCHANGEREASONID left join T_PM_User pu on pu.fid=bill.FAUDITORID
and bill.FCONTROLUNITID=#{orgId}
and bill.FCurProjectID in
#{item}
and bill.fname like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{title}),'%')
and bill.fnumber like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{num}),'%')
and bill.fchangestate like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{changeState}),'%')
and bill.fstate like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{auditState}),'%')
and ct.fname_l2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{auditType}),'%')
and pro.fname_l2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{projectName}),'%')
and pu.FNAME_L2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{auditor}),'%')
and bill.faudittime like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{auditTime}),'%')
order by bill.FBOOKEDDATE desc,bill.fnumber

select bill.fid as id,bill.FNAME as title ,bill.FNUMBER as num,bill.FCHANGESTATE as changeState, bill.FCHANGEREASONID as changeReasonId,cra.FNAME_L2 as changeReason,bill.FOFFER as offer, bill.FSTATE as auditState,bill.FBOOKEDDATE as bizDate,bill.FCURPROJECTID as projectId,pro.FNAME_L2 as projectName, bill.FAUDITTYPEID as auditTypeId,ct.FNAME_L2 as auditType,bill.FTOTALCOST as totalCost,bill.FREADESC as reaDesc, bill.FAUDITORID as auditorId,pu.FNAME_L2 as auditor,bill.FAUDITTIME as auditTime,bill.FSOURCEFUNCTION as sourceFunction, org.FNAME_L2 as conductDeptName,sup.FNAME_L2 as conductUnitName,wf.FNAME_L2 as wfType,bill.FOFFER as offer, bill.FISFEE as isFee,bill.FCOSTUNIT as costUnit,bill.FIsChangeContract as isChangeContract, bill.FIsReceipts as isReceipts,bill.FIsImportChange as isImportChange,bill.FIsAlreadyExecuted as isAlreadyDo, bill.FDESCRIPTION as description,un.FNAME_L2 as orgName,con.FNUMBER as contractNumber,con.FNAME as contractName, en.FOriCostAmount as oriCostAmount,sup1.FNAME_L2 as mainSupplierName,sup2.FNAME_L2 as copySupplierName, sup3.FNAME_L2 as generalSupplierName from T_CON_ChangeAuditBill bill left join T_FDC_CurProject pro on pro.fid=bill.FCURPROJECTID left join T_FDC_ChangeType ct on ct.fid=bill.FAUDITTYPEID left join T_FDC_ChangeReason cra on cra.FID=bill.FCHANGEREASONID left join T_PM_User pu on pu.fid=bill.FAUDITORID left join T_ORG_Admin org on org.fid=bill.FConductDeptID left join T_BD_Supplier sup on sup.fid=bill.FCONDUCTUNITID left join T_CON_ChangeWFType wf on wf.fid=bill.FWFTYPEID left join T_ORG_CtrlUnit un on un.fid=bill.FCONTROLUNITID left join T_CON_ChangeSupplierEntry en on en.FPARENTID=bill.FID left join T_CON_CONTRACTBILL con on con.fid=en.FCONTRACTBILLID left join T_CON_ChangeAuditEntry aen on aen.FPARENTID=bill.fid left join T_BD_Supplier sup1 on sup1.fid=en.FMAINSUPPID left join T_CON_CopySupplierEntry cse on cse.FPARENTID=en.FID left join T_BD_Supplier sup2 on sup2.fid=cse.FCOPYSUPPID left join T_CON_NewMainSupplierEntry nmse on nmse.FPARENTID=en.FID left join T_BD_Supplier sup3 on sup3.FID=nmse.FMAINSUPPID
where bill.fid=#{id} order by aen.FNUMBER
select fid as id,FCHANGECONTENT as changeContent,FISBACK as isBack,FEFFECT as effect from T_CON_ChangeAuditEntry where FPARENTID=#{id} order by fseq

select en.fid as id,con.FNUMBER as contractNumber,con.FNAME as contractName, sup.FNAME_L2 as mainSuppName,cur.FNAME_L2 as currencyName,en.FEXRATE as exRate, en.FORICOSTAMOUNT as oriCostAmount,en.FCOSTAMOUNT as costAmount,en.FCOSTDESCRIPTION as description, u.FNAME_L2 as reckonorName,ad.FNAME_L2 as dutyOrgName from T_CON_ChangeSupplierEntry en left join T_CON_ContractBill con on con.fid=en.FCONTRACTBILLID left join T_BD_Supplier sup on sup.fid=en.FMAINSUPPID left join T_BD_Currency cur on cur.fid=en.FCURRENCYID left join T_PM_User u on u.fid=en.FRECKONORID left join T_ORG_Admin ad on ad.fid=en.FDUTYORGID where en.FPARENTID=#{id} order by en.fseq
select fid from T_FDC_CURPROJECT where FPARENTID=#{projectId} or fid=#{projectId} and FIsEnabled = 1
